channel.title: Noclip reveal help
channel.description:
ok, i tried added a no-clip command and when activated it sid " + playername is a noob who wants to cheat" So i tried edititing so it said (name" is a noob who wnats toi cheat can someone please fix this command
(command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && (playerRights > 0)) { yell( + playerName" is a noob who wants to cheat!);

item.title: Noclip reveal help
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

wh was this command posted 3 times? it only needed 1 post, ut then again the irst post was si force’s and his code wont work cause you have the command startign then ending without dong anything you jsut had

if command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && (playerRights > 0)) { } sendMessage( playerName+" is a noob who wants to cheat); }

so the command was close and never openend again and should cause it to error

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip reveal help
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) && (playerRights > 0)) {
yell(playerName+" is a noob who wants to cheat!");
}
